org.apache.twill.internal

Class TwillContainerLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.internal.TwillContainerLauncher

  • public final class TwillContainerLauncher
extends Object
    This class helps launching a container.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public TwillContainerController start(RunId runId,
                                      int instanceId,
                                      Class<?> mainClass,
                                      String classPath,
                                      @Nullable
                                      Location logLevelLocation)
        Start execution run for a class in a container. Will return instance of TwillContainerController that allows sending messages directly to the container.
        Parameters:
        runId - Use to represent unique id of the container run.
        instanceId - The Twill instance Id.
        mainClass - The main class to run in the container.
        classPath - The class path to load classes for the container.
        logLevelLocation - The log level file location for the container to localize.
        Returns:
        instance of TwillContainerController to control the container run.

      • getMaxHeapMemoryMB

        public int getMaxHeapMemoryMB()
        Returns the maximum heap memory size in MB of the Java process launched in the container. This method can only be called after the start(RunId, int, Class, String, Location) method.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the start(RunId, int, Class, String, Location) was not called yet.
